scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts two haloed women in a landscape setting. The woman on the left, wearing a veil and a dark robe, looks upwards with her hand extended towards the woman on the right. The woman on the right, also haloed and dressed in a dark robe, gently touches the hand of the first woman. Behind them, stylized trees and rocky terrain are visible, with a patterned background suggesting a decorative element or sky. The overall composition suggests a moment of divine revelation or significant encounter.
